title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apne kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, mujhe rangon se khelna bahut pasand tha. Deewaron par, copy mein, har jagah!
Anushka: Maa daanti thi, lekin dil mein jaanti thi ki yeh toh pyaar hai… Kala ka pyaar.
Anushka: Fir badi hui, school gayi, degree li… Lekin woh rangon ka pyaar kam nahi hua.
Anushka: Naukri bhi ki kuch din, lekin dil toh canvas par hi atka tha.
Anushka: Ek din, himmat juta ke, sab chhod diya. Darr bhi laga, par dil mein umeed thi.
Anushka: Aur fir, maine apne sapnon ko jeena shuru kiya. Rang bharne lagi, apni zindagi mein bhi aur canvas par bhi.
Anushka: Ab main artist hoon. Logon ko meri paintings pasand aati hain.
Anushka: Yeh meri choti si kahani hai. Aap sabse bas yahi kehna chahti hoon ki apne passion ko hamesha follow karo.
Anushka: Shukriya!
